vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Kimley-Horn & Associates, Inc. to provide engineering services for erosion control and storm drainage improvements at 12 locations within the city of Dallas (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $919,255.39 - Financing:  Flood Control (D) Fund (2017 General Obligation Funds) ($791,698.46), Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund ($70,324.82), and Wastewater Capital Improvement E Fund ($57,232.11)
vote.description: Authorize a professional services contract with Kimley-Horn & Associates, Inc. to provide engineering services for erosion control and storm drainage improvements at 12 locations within the city of Dallas (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $919,255.39 - Financing:  Flood Control (D) Fund (2017 General Obligation Funds) ($791,698.46), Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund ($70,324.82), and Wastewater Capital Improvement E Fund ($57,232.11)
